reviews.review_msg: Dr. Lee is a good lecturer, but some of the material covered during the class felt dry or irrelevant. It was easy to tell what wouldn't be testable and yet the non-testable material seemed to always take up at least 50% of the 90 minute lectures. Exams were relatively straightforward. Dr. Lee badly needs a new TA though as the marking took FOREVER!

I had an amazing experience with Dr. Lee. All the examinable materials were on the lecture slides (no textbook) and the exams themselves were more than fair. Lectures felt like an open discussion rather than a blast of information. This class was a breath of fresh air. I highly recommend taking it with her, you will not regret it.
